# How to Use F5 WAF with Appdome MobileBOT™ Defense

Last updated July 31, 2025 by Appdome

Combining the F5 Web Application Firewall (WAF) with Appdome’s [MobileBOT™ Defense](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/mobile-bot-detection/mobile-bot-defense/mobilebot-detection/) creates a powerful dual-layered security solution to protect both the server and client sides of your applications. This introduction outlines how the technologies work together and directs you to further resources for detailed setup and configuration.

F5 WAF secures web applications at the server level. Complementing this, Appdome’s MobileBOT™ Defense protects mobile applications from specific threats by verifying [rate-limit connections](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/mobile-bot-detection/mobile-bot-defense/rate-limit-connections-anti-bot-defense/), implementing [mTLS Pre-Authentication](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/mobile-bot-detection/mobile-bot-defense/enforce-mtls-pre-authentication-in-mobilebot-defense/), managing [Session Headers](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/mobile-bot-detection/mobile-bot-defense/use-session-headers-in-mobile-bot-defense/), [Pin to Host](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/mobile-bot-detection/mobile-bot-defense/use-pin-to-host-in-android-ios-apps/), and more.

This dual-layer protection strategy effectively secures both entry points—server and client—against sophisticated cyber threats.

## **Prerequisites for Using F5 BIG-IP Mobile App Configuration**

In order to use the F5 Anti Bot verification app in conjunction with Appdome, you’ll need:

* An Android or iOS app that is secured by MobileBOT™ Defense
* An Appdome MobileBOT™ Defense License
* A configured and accessible BIG-IP server
* A server protected by F5’s BIG-IP

**For a Detailed Understanding of F5 Configurations,** please refer to the following articles for specific steps and configurations within F5:

* [Creating a Virtual Server on F5](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/mobile-bot-detection/mobile-bot-defense/creating-a-virtual-server-on-f5/)
* [Configuring SSL for F5 BIG-IP](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/mobile-bot-detection/mobile-bot-defense/configuring-ssl-for-f5-big-ip/)
* [Mutual TLS (mTLS) Configuration on F5](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/appdome/knowledge-base/mutual-tls-mtls-configuration-on-f5)
* [Configuring F5 iRules for Session Headers](https://www.appdome.com/how-to/appdome/knowledge-base/configuring-irules-for-custom-traffic-management-on-f5-session-headers)
